title: Hacker Highschool: Pete Herzog [ML BSide]
description: Pete Hertzog is a security expert and an educator with a vision: he wants our kids to learn about cybersecurity, and not just about not talking to strangers online - he wants them to learn even more advanced stuff, such as security analysis and hacking. Pete spoke with Nate Nelson about his Hacker Highschool initiative, and the lessons he learned from it.

Pete spoke with Nate Nelson about his Hacker Highschool initiative, and the lessons he learned from it.
